rules:
    example-in-parameters-oas3:
        description: Examples must be valid against their defined schema.
        formats:
            :
        given: $..parameters..[?(@.in == 'body')]..[?(@property !== 'properties' && @.example && ( @.type || @.format || @.$ref ))]
        message: {{error}}
        recommended: true
        severity: 0
        then:
            function: schemaPath
            functionOptions:
                field: example
                schemaPath: $
        type: validation
        x-tags:
            :
